thread.section_title: Americor Financial Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Americor Financial Services | americorfs.com
thread.title: Debra Schanck
thread.title_full: Americor Financial Services reviewed by Debra Schanck

author: Debra Schanck
title: Debra Schanck
text:
Honestly, thank you so much Americor and Richard Hubler for taking a very difficult and frightening experience and turning it into a manageable and effective plan to get me out of debt. I feel like a weight has been lifted off me and no longer feel guilty or ashamed for being in a situation brought on by illness. I really can't thank you enough for all your expert advice and help. My anxiety is gone! I trust you to keep me informed and updated as this process moves forward!
Sincerely, Debra S. Schanck
